meanings.definition: A pickled herring fillet rolled around a savory filling.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious rollmop at the party.
meanings.sent2: The rollmop was a popular appetizer at the seafood restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The rollmop looked like a tiny fish taco.
meanings.sent4: The rollmop was a flavorful surprise in the buffet spread.
meanings.sent5: The rollmop's tangy taste lingered on my palate.

meanings.definition: To roll up or wrap around something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to rollmop the blanket tightly.
meanings.sent2: He rollmopped the paper into a neat scroll.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to rollmop itself in the soft blanket.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast's body seemed to rollmop effortlessly in the air.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly rollmopped the dough around the filling.
